form-for-bootstrap.body:
<%= form_for ${1:@object}, html: { class: "form-horizontal" } do |${2:f}| %> <%= render 'layouts/error_messages', ${2:f}: ${2:f}.object %>
<%= ${2:f}.label :${3:attribute}, class: "control-label" %>
<%= ${2:f}.text_field :${3:attribute} %>
$4
<%= ${2:f}.submit class: "btn btn-primary" %>
<% end %>
